summary: This bill, the Ensuring Medicaid Eligibility Act of 2025, aims to restrict Medicaid eligibility. It prohibits the implementation of a rule streamlining Medicaid processes and mandates verification of citizenship or immigration status before enrollment. Furthermore, it limits Medicaid coverage for parolees, recipients of Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA), Temporary Protected Status (TPS), individuals with deferred enforced departure, asylum seekers, and those with withholding of removal.
